[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ShortcutRegistry](./blockly.shortcutregistry.md)

## ShortcutRegistry class

Class for the registry of keyboard shortcuts. This is intended to be a singleton. You should not create a new instance, and only access this class from ShortcutRegistry.registry.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ShortcutRegistry 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./blockly.shortcutregistry._constructor_.md) |  | Resets the existing ShortcutRegistry singleton. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [modifierKeys](./blockly.shortcutregistry.modifierkeys.md) | <code>static</code> | { Shift: KeyCodes; Control: KeyCodes; Alt: KeyCodes; Meta: KeyCodes; } | Enum of valid modifiers. |
|  [registry](./blockly.shortcutregistry.registry.md) | <code>static</code> | AnyDuringMigration |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addKeyMapping(keyCode, shortcutName, opt\_allowCollision)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.addkeymapping.md) |  | Adds a mapping between a keycode and a keyboard shortcut. |
|  [createSerializedKey(keyCode, modifiers)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.createserializedkey.md) |  | Creates the serialized key code that will be used in the key map. |
|  [getKeyCodesByShortcutName(shortcutName)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.getkeycodesbyshortcutname.md) |  | Gets the serialized key codes that the shortcut with the given name is registered under. |
|  [getKeyMap()](./blockly.shortcutregistry.getkeymap.md) |  | Gets the current key map. |
|  [getRegistry()](./blockly.shortcutregistry.getregistry.md) |  | Gets the registry of keyboard shortcuts. |
|  [getShortcutNamesByKeyCode(keyCode)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.getshortcutnamesbykeycode.md) |  | Gets the shortcuts registered to the given key code. |
|  [onKeyDown(workspace, e)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.onkeydown.md) |  | Handles key down events. |
|  [register(shortcut, opt\_allowOverrides)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.register.md) |  | Registers a keyboard shortcut. |
|  [removeAllKeyMappings(shortcutName)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.removeallkeymappings.md) |  | Removes all the key mappings for a shortcut with the given name. Useful when changing the default key mappings and the key codes registered to the shortcut are unknown. |
|  [removeKeyMapping(keyCode, shortcutName, opt\_quiet)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.removekeymapping.md) |  | Removes a mapping between a keycode and a keyboard shortcut. |
|  [reset()](./blockly.shortcutregistry.reset.md) |  | Clear and recreate the registry and keyMap. |
|  [setKeyMap(keyMap)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.setkeymap.md) |  | Sets the key map. Setting the key map will override any default key mappings. |
|  [unregister(shortcutName)](./blockly.shortcutregistry.unregister.md) |  | Unregisters a keyboard shortcut registered with the given key code. This will also remove any key mappings that reference this shortcut. |
